sqlMap.select: select * from main_file where kind = 'Y'
sqlMap.insert: insert into main_file (originNm , saveNm , kind , orderNum , regDate) values (#originNm# , #saveNm# , #kind# ,#orderNum# , now())
sqlMap.update: update main_file set originNm = #originNm#, saveNm = #saveNm# , kind = #kind#, orderNum = #orderNum#, regDate = now() where idx = #idx#
update main_file set originNm = #originNm#, saveNm = #saveNm# , kind = #kind#, orderNum = #orderNum# where idx = #idx#
sqlMap.select: select * from main_file where kind = 'I' order by regDate desc
select * from main_file where kind = 'I' order by orderNum , regDate desc
select count(*) num from main_file where kind='I'
sqlMap.delete: delete from main_file where kind='I' order by regDate limit #limit#
sqlMap.select: select * from main_file where idx = #idx#
sqlMap.update: update main_file set orderNum = #orderNum# where idx = #idx#
sqlMap.insert: insert into inquiry (title , text , pw , regDate , answerYn , delYn) values (#title# , #text# , #pw# , now() , 'N' , 'N')
insert into notice (title , text , expsYn , topYn , delYn , regDate) values (#title# , #text# , #expsYn# , #topYn# , 'N' , now())
update notice set title = #title#, text = #text#, expsYn = #expsYn#, topYn = #topYn# where idx = #idx#
sqlMap.select: select * from notice where delYn = 'N' order by regDate desc limit #firstindex#, #recordperpage#
select count(*) from notice where delYn = 'N'

select count(*) from notice where delYn = 'N' and expsYn = 'Y'
and idx not in ( #excludeIdx0#
,#excludeIdx1#
,#excludeIdx2#
)

select format(@ROWNUM:=@ROWNUM+1 , 0)as no, A.* from ( select @ROWNUM:=0) rn, (select * from notice where delYn = 'N'and expsYn='Y'
and idx not in ( #excludeIdx0#
,#excludeIdx1#
,#excludeIdx2#
)
order by regDate )A order by no desc limit #firstindex#, #recordperpage#
sqlMap.update: update notice set delYn = 'Y' where idx = #idx#
sqlMap.select: select * from notice where idx = #idx#
sqlMap.update: update notice set viewCnt = viewCnt + 1 where idx=#idx#
sqlMap.select: select * from inquiry where idx = #idx#
select format(@ROWNUM:=@ROWNUM+1 , 0)as no, A.* from ( select @ROWNUM:=0) rn, (select * from inquiry where delYn = 'N' order by regDate ) A order by no desc limit #firstindex#, #recordperpage#
select count(*) from inquiry where delYn = 'N'
sqlMap.update: update inquiry set delYn = 'Y' where idx = #idx#
update inquiry set answer = #answer#, answerYn= 'Y', answerDate = now() where idx = #idx#
sqlMap.select: select * from etc_board where kind = #kind#
sqlMap.insert: insert into etc_board (text , kind , regDate , updtDate) values(#text# , #kind# , now() , now())
sqlMap.update: update etc_board set text = #text#, kind = #kind#, updtDate = now() where idx = #idx#
sqlMap.select: select * from inquiry where idx=#idx#
sqlMap.update: update inquiry set title=#title#, text=#text# where idx=#idx#
update inquiry set delYn='Y' where idx=#idx#
update payment_log set price = #price# where uid=#uid#
sqlMap.select: select * from notice where topYn='Y' and delYn='N' and expsYn='Y' order by regDate desc limit 3

select m.midx , m.muserid , mi.nickname , m.socail, mi.ai , ifnull(i.amount,0) balance , ifnull(ii.amount,0) point , ifnull(iii.amount ,0) cash from member m left join member_info mi on mi.midx = m.midx left join item i on i.midx = m.midx and i.type = 'balance' left join item ii on ii.midx = m.midx and ii.type = 'point' left join item iii on iii.midx = m.midx and iii.type = 'cash' where 1=1
and (mi.ai = 0 or mi.ai is null) and mi.ai = 1
and (m.muserid like concat('%' ,#search# ,'%') or mi.nickname like concat('%' ,#search# ,'%'))
order by m.midx desc limit #first# , #record#

select count(*) from member m left join member_info mi on mi.midx = m.midx left join item i on i.midx = m.midx and i.type = 'balance' left join item ii on ii.midx = m.midx and ii.type = 'point' left join item iii on iii.midx = m.midx and iii.type = 'cash' where 1=1
and (mi.ai = 0 or mi.ai is null) and mi.ai = 1
and (m.muserid like concat('%' ,#search# ,'%') or mi.nickname like concat('%' ,#search# ,'%'))

select m.midx , m.muserid , mi.nickname , m.socail, mi.ai , ifnull(i.amount,0) balance , ifnull(ii.amount,0) point, ifnull(iii.amount ,0) cash from member m left join member_info mi on mi.midx = m.midx left join item i on i.midx = m.midx and i.type = 'balance' left join item ii on ii.midx = m.midx and ii.type = 'point' left join item iii on iii.midx = m.midx and iii.type = 'cash' where m.midx = #idx#
sqlMap.update: update item set amount = amount + #money# where midx = #idx# and type = #type#
update item set amount = amount - #money# where midx = #idx# and type = #type#
sqlMap.select:
select payment_log.* , m.muserid userId , mi.nickname userNick , m.socail from payment_log left join member m on payment_log.midx = m.midx left join member_info mi on payment_log.midx = mi.midx where product in (
#kind1#
,#kind2#
,#kind3#
,#kind4#
)
and (m.muserid like concat('%' ,#search# ,'%') or mi.nickname like concat('%' ,#search# ,'%'))
order by date desc limit #first# , #record#

select count(*) from ( select payment_log.* , m.muserid userId , mi.nickname userNick , m.socail from payment_log left join member m on payment_log.midx = m.midx left join member_info mi on payment_log.midx = mi.midx where product in (
#kind1#
,#kind2#
,#kind3#
,#kind4#
)
and (m.muserid like concat('%' ,#search# ,'%') or mi.nickname like concat('%' ,#search# ,'%'))
) A

select payment_log.* , m.muserid , mi.nickname , m.socail from payment_log left join member m on payment_log.midx = m.midx left join member_info mi on payment_log.midx = mi.midx where product not in ('ad_point_deposit' ,'ad_point_withdrawal' , 'ad_balance_deposit','ad_balance_withdrawal' ) and isCash = 1
and year = #year#
and month = #month#
and date between #startD# and #endD#
and (m.muserid like concat('%' ,#search# ,'%') or mi.nickname like concat('%' ,#search# ,'%'))
order by date desc
order by price desc
order by price
order by date desc
limit #first# , #record#

select count(*) from( select payment_log.* , m.muserid userId , mi.nickname userNick , m.socail from payment_log left join member m on payment_log.midx = m.midx left join member_info mi on payment_log.midx = mi.midx where product not in ('ad_point_deposit' ,'ad_point_withdrawal' , 'ad_balance_deposit','ad_balance_withdrawal' ) and isCash = 1
and year = #year#
and month = #month#
and date between #startD# and #endD#
and (m.muserid like concat('%' ,#search# ,'%') or mi.nickname like concat('%' ,#search# ,'%'))
) A

select ifnull(sum(price),0) sumCharge from payment_log left join member m on payment_log.midx = m.midx left join member_info mi on payment_log.midx = mi.midx where product not in ('ad_point_deposit' ,'ad_point_withdrawal' , 'ad_balance_deposit','ad_balance_withdrawal' ) and isCash = 1
and year = #year#
and month = #month#
and date between #startD# and #endD#
and (m.muserid like concat('%' ,#search# ,'%') or mi.nickname like concat('%' ,#search# ,'%'))

select ifnull(sum(price),0) sumCharge from payment_log left join member m on payment_log.midx = m.midx left join member_info mi on payment_log.midx = mi.midx where product not in ('ad_point_deposit' ,'ad_point_withdrawal' , 'ad_balance_deposit','ad_balance_withdrawal' ) and isCash = 1
and (m.muserid like concat('%' ,#search# ,'%') or mi.nickname like concat('%' ,#search# ,'%'))

select goldfeelog.* , m.muserid , mi.nickname , m.socail from goldfeelog left join member m on goldfeelog.uidx = m.midx left join member_info mi on goldfeelog.uidx = mi.midx where 1=1
and year(gdate) = #year#
and month(gdate) = #month#
and gdate between #startD# and #endD#
and (m.muserid like concat('%' ,#search# ,'%') or mi.nickname like concat('%' ,#search# ,'%'))
order by gdate desc , gidx desc limit #first# , #record#

select count(*) from ( select goldfeelog.* , m.muserid , mi.nickname , m.socail from goldfeelog left join member m on goldfeelog.uidx = m.midx left join member_info mi on goldfeelog.uidx = mi.midx where 1=1
and year(gdate) = #year#
and month(gdate) = #month#
and gdate between #startD# and #endD#
and (m.muserid like concat('%' ,#search# ,'%') or mi.nickname like concat('%' ,#search# ,'%'))
)A

select ifnull(sum(fee),0) sumFee from goldfeelog left join member m on goldfeelog.uidx = m.midx left join member_info mi on goldfeelog.uidx = mi.midx where 1=1
and year(gdate) = #year#
and month(gdate) = #month#
and gdate between #startD# and #endD#
and (m.muserid like concat('%' ,#search# ,'%') or mi.nickname like concat('%' ,#search# ,'%'))

select ifnull(sum(g.gvalue4),0) aiFee, (select ifnull(sum(goldback),0) from goldfeelog g left join member_info m on g.uidx = m.midx where m.ai = 1 and gameid = gf.gameid) aiMile from gamelog g , goldfeelog gf left join member m on gf.uidx = m.midx left join member_info mi on gf.uidx = mi.midx where g.gkind ='result' and g.gameIdentifier = gf.gameid
and year(gf.gdate) = #year#
and month(gf.gdate) = #month#
and gf.gdate between #startD# and #endD#
and (m.muserid like concat('%' ,#search# ,'%') or mi.nickname like concat('%' ,#search# ,'%'))

select ifnull(sum(g.gvalue5),0) getMoney from goldfeelog gf left join gamelog g on g.gameIdentifier = gf.gameid and g.gkind = 'result' left join member m on gf.uidx = m.midx left join member_info mi on gf.uidx = mi.midx where 1=1
and year(gf.gdate) = #year#
and month(gf.gdate) = #month#
and gf.gdate between #startD# and #endD#
and (m.muserid like concat('%' ,#search# ,'%') or mi.nickname like concat('%' ,#search# ,'%'))
and g.gvalue5 < 0
and g.gvalue5 > 0

select ifnull(sum(goldback),0) sumFee from goldfeelog left join member m on goldfeelog.uidx = m.midx left join member_info mi on goldfeelog.uidx = mi.midx where 1=1
and year(gdate) = #year#
and month(gdate) = #month#
and gdate between #startD# and #endD#
and (m.muserid like concat('%' ,#search# ,'%') or mi.nickname like concat('%' ,#search# ,'%'))

select ifnull(sum(fee),0) sumFee from goldfeelog left join member m on goldfeelog.uidx = m.midx left join member_info mi on goldfeelog.uidx = mi.midx where 1=1
and (m.muserid like concat('%' ,#search# ,'%') or mi.nickname like concat('%' ,#search# ,'%'))
sqlMap.update: update item set amount = amount+#amount# where type = #type# and midx = #midx#
sqlMap.select: select ifnull(sum(price),0) from payment_log where midx = #midx# and year = #year# and month = #month# and day = #day# and iscash = 1
select * from member where midx = #midx#
